p: The diagnosis and treatment program for COVID-19 was formulated by NHC of China [ 69, 74] and was previously suggested by WHO for SARS and MERS [ 75, 76, 77, 78]. The specific diagnostic measures have been implemented for suspected as well as confirmed cases: a patient with a minimum of two clinical symptoms and at least one exposure history is accounted as a suspected case. The suspected case should show at least three clinical symptoms if there is not any clear exposure history.
